function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential threat of common method bias in the data analysis process.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of results and faulty conclusions leading to inaccurate findings.","Mitigation":"Conducting common method bias tests and ensuring the variance explained by the method factor is minimal.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools like SPSS and SmartPLS for conducting common method bias tests.","People":"Research analysts, statisticians, and data scientists.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."},{"Description":"Low levels of convergent validity in the data, indicating potential issues with the measurement model.","Impact":"Unreliable and skewed results impacting the accuracy of findings and conclusions.","Mitigation":"Ensuring that all items have adequate loadings, composite reliability, and average variance extracted based on established thresholds.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for assessing convergent validity.","People":"Research analysts, statisticians, and data scientists.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."},{"Description":"Potential issues with discriminant validity, leading to inaccurate assessment of how different constructs in the model relate to each other.","Impact":"Incorrect interpretation of relationships between constructs, leading to flawed conclusions.","Mitigation":"Conducting inter-construct correlations and cross-loading assessments to ensure constructs genuinely discriminate against each other.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for assessing discriminant validity.","People":"Research analysts, statisticians, and data scientists.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."}]}
